member.name: M:CloudLibrary.Frontend.Controllers.CloudProviderController.Create(CloudLibrary.Core.Services.Requests.CreateCloudProviderRequest)
member.response: (Success) Returns a the created Cloud Provider json
(BadRequest) In case of incorrect request parameters
(Not Acceptable) In case of using setting response other than JSON or XML
